statements: SELECT * FROM user_location_interactions;
SELECT user_id, location_id FROM user_location_interactions WHERE interaction_type='like';
SELECT interaction_timestamp, location_id FROM user_location_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_location_interactions WHERE interaction_type='comment' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_location_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_location_interactions WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, location_id, interaction_type FROM user_location_interactions WHERE location_id = 'c2056841-ec2d-421c-a725-737f8ab042d9';
SELECT * FROM user_location_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('view', 'like') ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM user_location_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id, location_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_location_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY location_id, interaction_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = '456e7b89-12d3-89b2-4266-c1740001234e'
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%click%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locations
SELECT location_name, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, location_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_time;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT u.username, ui.interaction_time, l.city FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN locations l ON ui.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT ui.user_id, ui.interaction_time, ui.interaction_type, l.location_name FROM user_interactions ui JOIN locations l ON ui.location_id = l.location_id ORDER BY ui.interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT interaction_name, type_id FROM interaction_types WHERE type_id < 5 ORDER BY interaction_name ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE location_id = 12345;

SELECT u.username, l.location_name, i.interaction_name FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN locations l ON ui.location_id = l.location_id JOIN interaction_types i ON ui.interaction_type = i.interaction_name;
SELECT u.username, l.location_name FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN locations l ON ui.location_id = l.location_id WHERE u.registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_locations;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior ORDER BY behavior_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_friends ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, location_id, timestamp FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'like';
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_friends WHERE user_id = 5 OR friend_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, DATE(timestamp) AS activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'post' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
